sentences.sCn: 他们乘出租车去动物园。

sentences.sContent: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.sContent_eng: The parrots in the zoo are popping all the time.
sentences.sCn: 动物园里的鹦鹉一直在生小鹦鹉。

sentences.sContent: He then adds the usual caveat: "But, as a zoo director, I understand that it is absolutely essential that we keep them there.
sentences.sContent_eng: He then adds the usual caveat: "But, as a zoo director, I understand that it is absolutely essential that we keep them there.
sentences.sCn: 接着他补充一贯的说明：“但是，作为一个动物园园长，我明白我们将它们放在那里是绝对必要的。”

words.tran: 动物病；[动] 动物传染病

trans.tranOther: a place, usually in a city, where animals of many kinds are kept so that people can go to look at them
